oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gospel Singing featuring Reverend Squeaky Morgan and the Harrison Gospel Singers (17361)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gospel music; Hemphills (Musical group); Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half-sheet (red and black on white) advertising a Big Gospel Sing featuring Red. Squeaky Morgan and the Harrison Gospel Singers, the Voices of Nashville, the Bogard Brothers, the Chimes of Cannan, and the Hemphill Singers. Poster features a metal photoplate of Rev. Squeaky Morgan and the Harrison Gospel Singers. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/43792/
